data.title: Legendary hitmakers Atlanta Rhythm Section, Orleans, coming to Niceville
data.meta_description: NICEVILLE, Fla. — Legendary hitmakers Atlanta Rhythm Section and Orleans are teaming up to bring melodic magic to the Mattie Kelly Arts Center (MKAC) in Niceville on June 29. data.text:
NICEVILLE, Fla. — Legendary hitmakers Atlanta Rhythm Section and Orleans are teaming up to bring melodic magic to the Mattie Kelly Arts Center (MKAC) in Niceville on June 29.

The two iconic bands dominated the charts in the 1970s and 1980s. Atlanta Rhythm Section (ARS) with top 10 hits, “So Into You,” “Imaginary Lover,” “Doraville,” “I’m Not Gonna Let It Bother Me Tonight,” “Champagne Jam,” Angel,” “Do It Or Die,” and “Spooky.“

Orleans charted such unforgettable radio hits as “Still The One,” “Dance With Me,” and “Love Takes Time.”

The two bands’ classic music still resonates with audiences of all ages, thanks to continued airplay on classic rock radio, television, film, and streaming services.

With multiple gold and platinum albums to their credit, both groups continue to be in demand for live shows, as they have been for more than five decades.

Showtime is 7 p.m. Reserved tickets start at $43. Tickets can be purchased at the box office on the day of the show or pre-purchased online.
